63.eng-name: Merits of the Helpers in Madinah (Ansaar)

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu 'Is-haq: Sa`d bin Abi Waqqas said: None embraced Islam, except on the day I embraced it. And for seven days I was one of the three persons who were Muslims (one-third of Islam)

chapter.ara-name: بَاب إِسْلَامُ سَعْدِ بْنِ أَبِي وَقَّاصٍ رَضِيَ اللَّهُ عَنْهُ
chapter.eng-name: The conversion of Sa'd رضي الله عنه to Islam
